roleset.name: impoverish, inflict misery upon
roleset.note: IMMISERATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Comparison to 'impoverish'. (from immiserate.01-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: * denounces the Civil Rights Act because it infringed the free - market right of a monolithic white establishment *PRO* to immiserate blacks ;
